attributes.action: Boycott Chinese goods to help save endangered species
attributes.additional_details: China and it's people are responsible for the wholesale destruction and abuse of many species of animal. It's time the world came together to educate them and prevent this unnecessary destruction and cruelty. Western medicine has moved forward but the Chinese still live with the belief that medieval remedies will cure their ailments. The only way this will stop is by affecting their finances. We call on the government take a serious stand with the Chinese with regards to trade and help save the worlds wonderful wildlife.
